title: I have 58 RP. Could you please subtract 3 RP?
body:
I won't miss that 3 RP, I promise. 
I received it from a promotion you guys had with American Express (loved that promo by the way) and would just like it gone. 
It bothers me and makes me cringe everytime I log on to see it, and I've been dealing with it for around a year now. 


Please help me out. xD

Love you guys!

replies.body: Don't have them delete it until you see how difficult it is getting to 0 RP from 58 vs 55.  Remember, to win LOL, you need 0 RP.

I definitely see how that could be bothersome. :P

We can certainly help you out if you reach out to our account specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
